subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Jamie McCourt, the chief executive of the Dodgers, said she had been fired by the team owner, her estranged husband, Frank McCourt. The McCourts separated this month.
snippet: A lawyer for Jamie McCourt, the chief executive of the Dodgers, said she had been fired by the team owner, her estranged husband, Frank McCourt. The McCourts separated this month.
